name: Pokémon Unbreakable Ties
storyline:
Travel through the Akebia's region, an invented region based in a tropical place. There's no starter to choose, you will see why, but your first Pokemon will be Riolu, a pokemon that you need to create a tie with it to make it stronger. This is how the philosophy of stong trainers works, the tie with your Pokemon is the most important thing.
As the protagonist, you are a teenager, like 16 years old, and you don't know what to do with your life. It's then, when your rivals and mostly, your father, will push you to have your firts Pokemon to see the world.

All the charaters in game are totally invented, so you won't see Ash, Gray and the thypical characters.
About the Villans, they're the Royal Family. They're suposed the maximum power in the region, that makes that all the people has to make what they say. Nobody can't contadict their decisions. Are they suposed to be from the heaven? You will see through the story.

The legendary Pokemon, in this case, are Latias and Latios, the protectors of the Akebia's region. But, are they strong enough to battle the Royal Familly? You will need to help them through the adventure.
summary: Unbreakable Ties is a Pokemon fangame with a deep story where you're gonna enjoy a tropical adventure on the warm and exciting Akebia's region, discovering the mistery from its own legendary Pokemon and the conexion with the protagonists.
